mapper.select:
WITH LGN_EMP_UPR_MNGR AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT level lvl, A.ORGN_MGMT_CD, A.ORGN_NM, A.ORGN_CD FROM ( SELECT ORGN_MGMT_CD , ORGN_CD , ORGN_NM , HSRK_ORGN_MGMT_CD , UPR_ORGN_MGMT_CD , (SELECT ORGN_MGMT_CD FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND ORGN_MGMT_CD = A.UPR_ORGN_MGMT_CD) AS UP_CD FROM TB_POTI_ORGN A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ) A WHERE 1 = 1 START WITH A.ORGN_MGMT_CD = ( SELECT E.ORGN_MGMT_CD FROM TB_POTI_EMP E WHERE E.PBSR_NO = #{userId} ) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.UPR_ORGN_MGMT_CD = A.ORGN_MGMT_CD ) ) SELECT A.*, CASE LVL WHEN 1 THEN ( ( SELECT LISTAGG( PBSR_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PBSR_NO) FROM ( SELECT PBSR_NO FROM TB_POTI_EMP WHERE ORGN_MGMT_CD = A.ORGN_MGMT_CD AND fn_get_emp_bwrk_stts(PBSR_NO,'Y') = 'TRUE' /** 부재중건이 없으면 근무중 상태로 봄 */ AND CLPS_CD = '03' /* COM_0064 03 : DIRECTEUR */ ) ) )
WHEN 2 THEN ( ( SELECT LISTAGG( PBSR_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PBSR_NO) FROM ( SELECT PBSR_NO FROM TB_POTI_EMP WHERE ORGN_MGMT_CD = A.ORGN_MGMT_CD AND fn_get_emp_bwrk_stts(PBSR_NO,'Y') = 'TRUE' /** 부재중건이 없으면 근무중 상태로 봄 */ AND CLPS_CD = '11'/* COM_0064 11 : CHEF DE SECTEUR (섹터장) */ ) ) ) WHEN 3 THEN ( ( SELECT LISTAGG( PBSR_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PBSR_NO) FROM ( SELECT PBSR_NO FROM TB_POTI_EMP B , TB_POTI_ORGN C WHERE B.ORGN_MGMT_CD = A.ORGN_MGMT_CD AND B.ORGN_MGMT_CD = C.ORGN_MGMT_CD AND fn_get_emp_bwrk_stts(B.PBSR_NO,'Y') = 'TRUE' /** 부재중건이 없으면 근무중 상태로 봄 */ AND B.CLPS_CD = '10' /* 10 : 세관장 */ ) ) ) WHEN 4 THEN ( ( SELECT LISTAGG( PBSR_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PBSR_NO) FROM ( SELECT PBSR_NO FROM TB_POTI_EMP WHERE ORGN_MGMT_CD = A.ORGN_MGMT_CD AND fn_get_emp_bwrk_stts(PBSR_NO,'Y') = 'TRUE' /** 부재중건이 없으면 근무중 상태로 봄 */ AND CLPS_CD = '25' /* COM_0064 25 : CHEF DE SERVICE (서비스장) */ ) ) ) END AS HEAD_PBSR_NO FROM LGN_EMP_UPR_MNGR A
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRCS_STTS_CD , PRCS_STTS_PR_PRFR_CD FROM TB_CLRI_DED_PRCS_BRKD WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = #{dtlDcshNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRCS_SRNO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(PRCS_SRNO), 0) + 1 FROM TB_CLRI_DED_PRCS_BRKD WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = #{dtlDcshNo}
INSERT INTO TB_CLRI_DED_PRCS_BRKD ( DTL_DCSH_NO /** Numero du DAU !== DED번호 ==! */ , PRCS_SRNO /** N° de sequence de traitement !== 처리일련번호 ==! */
, PRCS_STTS_CD /** Code de statut de traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */
, PRCS_STTS_PR_PRFR_CD /** Code d'execution par statut de traitement !== 처리상태별수행코드 ==! */
, PRCS_DTRM_DTTM /** Date et heure de la decision de traitement !== 처리결정일시 ==! */
, PRCS_STTS_CN /** Contenu du statut de traitement !== 처리상태내용 ==! */
, PRCS_STTS_CN /** Contenu du statut de traitement !== 처리상태내용 ==! */
, HIST_SRNO /** N° de sequence de l'histoire !== 이력일련번호 ==! */ , DEL_YN /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , FRST_REGST_ID /** ID du premier enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date et heure de premier enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , LAST_CHPR_ID /** ID du modificateur final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date et heure de modification finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ ) VALUES ( #{dtlDcshNo} /** Numero du DAU !== DED번호 ==! */ , #{prcsSrno} /** N° de sequence de traitement !== 처리일련번호 ==! */
, #{prcsSttsCd} /** Code de statut de traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */
, #{prcsSttsPrPrfrCd} /** Code d'execution par statut de traitement !== 처리상태별수행코드 ==! */
, SYSDATE /** Date et heure de la decision de traitement !== 처리결정일시 ==! */
, ( SELECT APRV_OPIN_CN FROM TB_POTI_APRV_D WHERE APRV_ID = #{aprvId} AND APRV_SRNO = (SELECT MAX(APRV_SRNO) FROM TB_POTI_APRV_D WHERE APRV_ID = #{aprvId} ) ) /** Contenu du statut de traitement !== 처리상태내용 ==! */
, #{prcsSttsCn}
, (SELECT HIST_SRNO FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = #{dtlDcshNo}) , 'N' /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , #{frstRegstId} /** ID du premier enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date et heure de premier enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , #{lastChprId} /** ID du modificateur final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date et heure de modification finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ )
mapper.select:
/* ClriComPrcs_selectCsclUprMngr */ SELECT PBSR_NO FROM TB_POTI_EMP WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CLPS_CD = '11'
AND CLPS_CD IN ('10','24')
AND CLPS_CD = '25'
AND fn_get_emp_bwrk_stts(PBSR_NO,'Y') = 'TRUE' /** 부재중건이 없으면 근무중 상태로 봄 */ AND ORGN_MGMT_CD IN ( SELECT
SCTR_MGMT_CD
CSTM_MGMT_CD
DEPT_MGMT_CD
FROM TB_POTI_EMP WHERE PBSR_NO = ( SELECT AUDT_EMP_ID FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = #{dtlDcshNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) ) AND PBSR_NO = #{userId}
/* ClriComPrcs_selectCnclPrcsYn */ SELECT 1 AS CNCL_PRCS_YN FROM TB_CLRI_DED_CLDL_CLOA WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = #{dtlDcshNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND LAST_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT NVL(SUM(FLOOR(PAY_TAX_AMT)), 0) FROM (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_TAX_AMT), 0) AS PAY_TAX_AMT FROM TB_CLRI_DED_TAX WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = #{dtlDcshNo} AND PAY_KND_CD = '0' AND DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY TAX_CD )

SELECT A.prcs_stts_cd FROM tb_clri_ded_prcs_brkd A WHERE A.dtl_dcsh_no = #{dtlDcshNo} AND A.del_yn = 'N' AND A.prcs_srno = ( SELECT B.prcs_srno - 1 FROM tb_clri_ded_prcs_brkd B WHERE B.dtl_dcsh_no = A.dtl_dcsh_no AND B.prcs_stts_cd = 'F01' ORDER BY B.prcs_srno desc LIMIT 1)
SELECT A.prcs_stts_cd FROM tb_clri_ded_prcs_brkd A WHERE A.dtl_dcsh_no = #{dtlDcshNo} AND A.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY prcs_srno DESC LIMIT 1
